creator: j_a_fernandez@yahoo.com
text:
XMLValidate somehow fails to validate files containing <!ENTITY> usages.
The task fails with no indication of what the error is.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
Could you please try a nightly build of 2002-11-28 or later.  I may have fixed
that as a side-effect of the fix for bug 11279.

creator: j_a_fernandez@yahoo.com
text:
